ess-beta-metadata.label: Preventable cardiovascular mortality (Northern Ireland)
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Age-standardised mortality from cardiovascular diseases considered preventable for people aged under 75, per 100,000 people
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the age-standardised mortality rate from cardiovascular diseases considered preventable for those aged under 75 per 100,000 population, in Northern Ireland, for 2001-2003 to 2021-2023.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats:
All figures up to and including 2011 are based on the 2011 Census mid-year population estimates.

All figures from 2012 onward are based on the 2021 Census mid-year population estimates.

This indicator covers the period since March 2020 and includes the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.

Rates presented are based on year of death registration, not year of occurrence.
